projects.title: Sales Performance Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive dashboard analyzing quarterly sales performance with predictive analytics

details.challenge: Company needed better visibility into sales performance and forecasting
details.solution: Created comprehensive dashboard with real-time data integration and predictive models
details.results: 15% increase in sales, 30% reduction in reporting time, improved forecasting accuracy by 25%

projects.title: Customer Churn Analysis
projects.description: Machine learning model to predict and prevent customer churn

details.challenge: High customer churn rate affecting business growth
details.solution: Developed ML model to identify at-risk customers and implemented targeted retention strategies
details.results: 22% reduction in customer churn, $2M in retained revenue, improved customer satisfaction scores

projects.title: Supply Chain Optimization
projects.description: Data-driven approach to optimize inventory and reduce costs

details.challenge: Inefficient inventory management leading to high costs and stockouts
details.solution: Analyzed supply chain data to optimize inventory levels and improve demand forecasting
details.results: 18% reduction in inventory costs, 40% reduction in stockouts, improved supplier relationships

projects.title: Executive KPI Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time executive dashboard for monitoring key business metrics and performance indicators

details.challenge: Executives needed real-time visibility into business performance across all departments
details.solution: Built comprehensive KPI dashboard with automated data refresh and mobile accessibility
details.results: 40% faster decision making, 60% reduction in manual reporting, improved data accuracy to 99.5%

projects.title: Marketing Analytics Model
projects.description: Advanced analytics model to optimize marketing spend and ROI across multiple channels

details.challenge: Marketing team needed better insights into channel performance and budget allocation
details.solution: Developed comprehensive analytics model with attribution analysis and budget optimization
details.results: 35% improvement in marketing ROI, 25% reduction in wasted ad spend, 50% better budget allocation

projects.title: Financial Risk Dashboard
projects.description: Comprehensive risk monitoring dashboard for financial institutions with real-time alerts

details.challenge: Financial institution needed real-time risk monitoring and early warning systems
details.solution: Built comprehensive risk dashboard with machine learning models for early detection
details.results: 50% reduction in risk exposure, 80% faster risk detection, 99.9% uptime
